Module com.github.cowwoc.tokenbucket
Package com.github.cowwoc.tokenbucket

Class Limit.ConfigurationUpdater

java.lang.Object
com.github.cowwoc.tokenbucket.Limit.ConfigurationUpdater
Enclosing class:
Limit
public final class Limit.ConfigurationUpdater extends Object
Updates this Limit's configuration.

Thread-safety: This class is not thread-safe.

    • startOfCurrentPeriod

      public Limit.ConfigurationUpdater startOfCurrentPeriod(Instant startOfCurrentPeriod)
      Indicates when the most recent period has started.

      Possible values include:

      • unchanged to start tokensPerPeriod relative to the old configuration's period.
      • lastUpdatedAt to start a new period immediately.
      Parameters:
      startOfCurrentPeriod - the time that the current period has started
      Returns:
      this
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if startOfCurrentPeriod is null

    • tokensAddedInCurrentPeriod

      public Limit.ConfigurationUpdater tokensAddedInCurrentPeriod(int tokensAddedInCurrentPeriod)
      Sets the number of tokens that were added since startOfCurrentPeriod.

      Possible values include:

      • unchanged to start tokensPerPeriod relative to the old configuration's period.
      • 0 to start a new period immediately.
      Parameters:
      tokensAddedInCurrentPeriod - the number of tokens that were added since startOfCurrentPeriod
      Returns:
      this
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if tokensAddedSinceLastPeriod is negative
